description:
500 Health
30 Armor
30 Magic Resist
8% Move Speed

Call Lightning
Every 16 seconds, Autocast summon a stormcloud above you, which after a brief delay fires a lightning bolt, dealing plus 10% max Health magic damage and Slowing by 30% for 2 seconds.

If you are struck by the lightning, gain a Shield for 2 seconds.

Fully Automated
Your Autocast Cooldowns are reduced by 1 seconds and benefit from your Ability Haste.

Call Lighting has a minimum cooldown of 5 seconds.
name: Lightning Rod
